snippet: Representative Peter King of New York is helping to generate buzz around the idea of a 2016 presidential campaign, recently sending a fund-raising solicitation to supporters saying that he is considering a run.
abstract: Representative Peter King of New York is helping to generate buzz around the idea of a 2016 presidential campaign, recently sending a fund-raising solicitation to supporters saying that he is considering a run.

headline.main: Peter King Seeks to Fuel Talk of Presidential Bid
